data.title: Exchange Visitors Program of the Philippines
data.meta_description: refers to the international exchange program administered by the United States to implement the Mutual Education and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961, as amended, Public Law 87-256, 22 USC 2451, et seq. (1988).
